entry.string: You master site directory "".$masterfolder."" does not exist! Please create it first and make sure it is writeable chmod 777!.
entry.translation: Yuoo mester seete-a durectury "".$masterfolder."" dues nut ixeest! Pleese-a creete-a it furst und meke-a soore-a it is vreeteeble-a chmud 777!.

entry.string: Unable to configure Master Multisite, check all directories exist and are writeable, and database tables are available.
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu cunffeegoore-a Mester Moolteesite-a, check ell durectureees ixeest und ere-a vreeteeble-a, und detebese-a tebles ere-a efeeeleble-a.
